definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: I have worn round my neck the evening wreath of bakulas woven by the hand of love.
sentences.chinese: 我颈上戴过爱人手织的醉花的花圈，作为晚装。

sentences.english: A wreath was laid on the monument to a fanfare of trumpets.
sentences.chinese: 在响亮的号角声中花圈被献在纪念碑前。

sentences.english: They were twining holly into a wreath.
sentences.chinese: 他们在用冬青枝编一个花圈。

sentences.english: It is diplomatic protocol for all visiting heads of state to lay a wreath here.
sentences.chinese: 所有来访的国家元首敬献花圈都是外交礼仪。

sentences.english: Wreaths were laid at the martyr's tomb.
The bootee of roses sat at its foot, towered over by tall wreaths3 and sprays.
sentences.chinese: 那瓶玫瑰还在高高的花圈和枝丫上放着。

sentences.english: Following the  placement of the wreath, the marines will lower the flag to half staff.
sentences.chinese: 在敬献花圈后，美国海军陆战队员将降半旗志哀。

sentences.english: Secure silk flowers in a wreath with wire.
sentences.chinese: 在一个安全的绢花花圈线。

sentences.english: I have worn round my neck the evening wreath of baklas woven by the hand of love.
sentences.chinese: 我颈上戴过爱人手织的醉花的花圈，作为晚装。

sentences.english: I have worn round my neck the evening wreath of 6) bakulas woven by the hand of love.
sentences.chinese: 我颈上戴过爱人用醉花亲手编织的晚会花圈。

sentences.english: Prior to the meeting, Hu laid a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier beneath the Arc de Triomphe.
sentences.chinese: 会见前，胡锦涛在凯旋门向无名烈士墓献花圈。

sentences.english: Vivors put some wreathes on the sea surface.
sentences.chinese: 幸存者在海面上放了一些花圈。

sentences.english: Today, many wreaths are made from Rosemary as a symbol of remembrance.
sentences.chinese: 今天，许多花圈是由罗斯玛丽的象征悼念。

sentences.english: Some of them have wreaths too, or they sell daisies in brown plastic pots.
sentences.chinese: 有些人也卖花圈，或者买雏菊，装载棕色塑料罐里。

sentences.english: Following the placement of the wreath, the marines will lower the flag to half staff.
sentences.chinese: 在敬献花圈后，美国水师陆战队员将下半旗志哀。

definition: to offer condolences (for the deceased)/to condole
to wear mourning clothes/to be in mourning/also written 披麻帶孝|披麻带孝
to offer flowers/to lay flowers (as a memorial)
to participate in funeral procession/to attend a burial
to burn paper offerings (as part of religious ceremony)
to mourn/to pay last respects/mourning/memorial (service etc)
joss paper made to resemble paper money
ritual money made of paper burnt for the Gods or the dead
joss paper made to resemble paper money
